tool_description: Is this comment positive or negative? Find out the tone.
name: Sentiment Analysis
title: Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: Analyze (post)
api_list.description: Return sentiment analysis results with score for the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Enter some text to analyze (maximum 100 words or 1,500 characters)
parameters.default: great value in its price range!

utterances.utterance: What is the sentiment of the comment 'This product is absolutely fantastic!'?
Analyze the tone of the statement 'I had a terrible experience with their customer service.'

parameters.text: I had a terrible experience with their customer service.

utterances.utterance: Is the feedback 'The food was delicious and the service was excellent.' positive or negative?

parameters.text: The food was delicious and the service was excellent.

utterances.utterance: Determine the sentiment of the review 'The movie was boring and the plot was predictable.'

parameters.text: The movie was boring and the plot was predictable.

utterances.utterance: What is the tone of the comment 'I love the new design, it's very user-friendly.'?

parameters.text: I love the new design, it's very user-friendly.

utterances.utterance: Analyze the sentiment of the statement 'The delivery was late and the package was damaged.'

parameters.text: The delivery was late and the package was damaged.

utterances.utterance: Is the feedback 'The hotel room was clean and comfortable.' positive or negative?

parameters.text: The hotel room was clean and comfortable.

utterances.utterance: Determine the sentiment of the review 'The app crashes frequently and is difficult to use.'

parameters.text: The app crashes frequently and is difficult to use.

utterances.utterance: What is the tone of the comment 'The concert was amazing, the band played all my favorite songs.'?

parameters.text: The concert was amazing, the band played all my favorite songs.

utterances.utterance: Analyze the sentiment of the statement 'The product arrived broken and the customer service was unhelpful.'

parameters.text: The product arrived broken and the customer service was unhelpful.
